style.description: Css style object to apply to timeline.

pendingDotIcon.description: Set the dot of the last ghost node when pending is true.

pending.description: Set the last ghost node's existence or its content.

iconField.description: Use a custom icon field. Defaults to 'icon'.

styleField.description: Use a custom style field. Defaults to 'style'.

colorField.description: Use a custom color field. Defaults to 'color'.

positionField.description: Use a custom position field. Defaults to 'position'.

labelField.description: Use a custom label field. Defaults to 'label'.

mode.description: By sending alternate the timeline will distribute the nodes to the left and right.
